about.title: About Us
about.body: CertisTech delivers enterprise-grade audit and document control solutions. We combine compliance expertise with modern software practices to help organizations achieve traceability, governance, and trust.
about.vision: To be the trusted partner for organizations seeking rigorous, auditable, and compliant technology solutions.
about.mission: We build software that meets enterprise-grade standards—enabling teams to operate with confidence, full traceability, and compliance readiness.
howWeWork.title: How We Work
howWeWork.methodology: We follow an iterative, compliance-first approach—agile where it fits, rigorous where it matters.

howWeWork.steps.title: Discovery
howWeWork.steps.body: Understand your requirements, regulations, and workflows.

howWeWork.steps.title: Design
howWeWork.steps.body: Architect solutions aligned with your governance and audit needs.

howWeWork.steps.title: Build
howWeWork.steps.body: Develop with traceability, roles, and retention built in from day one.

howWeWork.steps.title: Deploy
howWeWork.steps.body: On-prem or local-first deployment with training and handover.

howWeWork.steps.title: Support
howWeWork.steps.body: Ongoing maintenance, updates, and compliance guidance.

standards.title: Enterprise-Grade Standards. Built for Every Scale.
standards.body: We build software aligned with enterprise-grade standards, designed for organizations that value governance, compliance, and traceability.
standards.list: Serving: Startups, Enterprises, Government, Healthcare, Energy, and beyond.
